enhanced_by.reason: The add method requires an instance of BoundedPriorityQueue, which is created by the create method.
The reverse method is used to initialize the queue's comparator, which is essential for the add method's functionality.
The asList method provides a view of the queue, which can be useful to verify the state of the queue after adding elements.
The asOrderedList method provides a sorted view of the queue, which can be useful to verify the order of elements after adding.
